programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 29/10/94. The Reds took on Kevin Keegan's tabling-topping Newcastle looking for a revenge after the Magpies had dumped them out of the League Cup just 3 days earlier.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 27/12/95. United were 10 points behind Kevin Keegan's Newcastle at the top of the Premiership when the Magpies came to Old Trafford for this Christmas cracker.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/96. The Reds faced a crunch game in the title race as they sought to overhaul Newcastle, victory would close the gap to just one point with nine games to go.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 97/98
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/97. The Reds were sitting a point clear at the top of the table ahead of a Christmas cracker against second-placed Newcastle.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives: Andy Cole scores a brace against his former club to maintain the Reds' advantage at the top of the table.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 20/8/00. United take on Bobby Robson's Magpies on the opening day of the 2000-01 season.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 02/03
programme.desc: United Archives 23/11/02. Ruud Van Nistelrooy makes the headlines in this game full of goals.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 12/1/08. The Reds took on Newcastle on what was to be a memorable evening for Cristiano Ronaldo. This was the night that he scored his one and only hat-trick for United.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 16/8/10. After losing out on the Premier League title to Chelsea, the Reds kicked off the new season by welcoming newly-promoted Newcastle to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 26/11/11. The Reds desperately needed a win to keep pace with Manchester City at the top of the table.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 7/10/12. United travelled to St James' Park desperate to erase the memory of last season's 3-0 defeat at the hands of the Magpies.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Cleo enlists Deuce and Frankie to help train her new pet snake in 'Pet Problems', then in 'License to Rock', Finnegan must impress a raging kraken to become Monster High's band leader. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Power Heist: When Toralei's mom, Catratina Stripe, substitute teaches at Monster High, Toralei and Clawdeen become unlikely partners. Catarina proposes a monstrous trade. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Pretty Little Choirs: When a mean girl sabotages Phoebe in choir and takes advantage of Max by making him do her homework for her, the twins work together to get even with her. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Paging Dr. Thunderman: Max and Phoebe take Billy to the hospital when he hurts his thumb. They must stop the doctors seeing Max's brain scan which could expose their powers! (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Elevator Kiss: When Kid Danger saves Bianca, they kiss. Henry is fine with this until he realizes Bianca kissed Kid Danger, not Henry. Henry is upset that Bianca cheated on him. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Man of the House: When Henry's mom has her purse stolen, Captain Man decides he should move in with Henry's family to protect them, but Henry isn't so keen. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Contact: The Hunters attempt a high stakes exchange to rescue their parents while working to outwit Aunt Hedwig and Uncle Eugene. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs put their parenting skills to the test in 'Bringing Up Smurfy', then in 'The Makeover', Vanity wants to design an outfit for the Smurfs, but he and Tailor have different visions. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Okey-Dokey!: Jokey has a new prank: giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say "okey dokey" to every request. (S2, ep 6b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: The twins realise spoilers aren't so bad after all in 'Spoiler Alert', then in 'Something Fishy', Best and Bester jump the line for the new fish restaurant, but things take a dramatic turn. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick's behaviour in 'The Fishbowl', and then in 'Married to Money', Mr Krabs takes Plankton's advice and finally marries the only thing he ever loved... money!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends in 'Mall Girl Pearl', and then in 'Two Thumbs Down', SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs and must get them working before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The App: When Dave gets a parenting App to help supervise The Chipmunks, Alvin tries everything to escape its control. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Doggone It: All the kids at school are obsessed with their virtual dogs on their smart phones. When all the phones wind up missing, Alvin is blamed for the theft and must clear his name. (S1, ep 41)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Munk Man: Simon creates a Super Hero costume for a convention he's attending. But when Alvin wants to join, the two fight over who the real hero is.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Jinxed!: After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him. (S5, ep 11b)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a talking Krabby Patty whose only wish is to be eaten in 'My Friend Patty', then in 'Fun-Believable', Rube explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln's crew try to heist a rare comic book in 'Karaless Whisper', then in 'Dollars and Scents', Miguel starts a perfume line. (S8, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After getting rid of Ouchie, Pinkeye takes over the Star house in 'Get Ouch', and in 'Day of the Living Dad Jokes', Patrick and Squidina must find safety amidst the dad joke apocalypse. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: One Henry, Three Girls - Part 1: While trying to capture The Mad Granny, who keeps terrorizing Captain Man, Henry is forced to juggle his work life and his romantic life. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: One Henry, Three Girls - Part 2: Henry's romantic life gets still more complicated, as the return of Chloe means that going to the dance with her and Brianna may not be possible. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Tinkle, Ouchie, and Pinkeye must venture back home together in 'The Uncredible Journey', then in 'Host-a-Palooza', Patrick gets injured, so his family members take turns hosting the show. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum in 'The Patterfly Effect', then in 'A Space Affair to Remember', Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay, in 'FarmerBob', and then in 'Gary and Spot', Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal Spot.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton disguises himself to get the Krabby Patty formula in 'Someone's in the Kitchen with Sandy', and then in 'The Inside Job', Plankton goes inside SpongeBob's head to get the secret recipe.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: My Life As a Dog: Theodore must pose as a dog after the chipmunks accidently shave the fur off a dog Miss Miller is dog sitting. (S5, ep 19b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: AlBrittina: When Alvin catches Simon taking a personality test to discover his soul-mate, he decides to do the same and prove just how silly the test really is. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Super Heroes: When Theodore thinks he's a real superhero, Alvin and Simon have a tough time convincing him to leave the crime fighting to the professionals. (S1, ep 37)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Let's Make a Deal: While attempting to make a special present for Dave, Alvin creates a snowball effect of chaos.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hosts a time-travelling food show in 'Time to Eat', then in 'Cleaning House', while Bunny's in Klopnod, the Star home becomes a mess. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Stars celebrate Patrick's birthday at the Chum Bucket in 'The Fun Bucket', then in 'The Patrick Show After Dark', Patrick and Squidina explore Bikini Bottom late at night. (S3, ep 1)

programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.desc: Double Oh Beth: With most of the class already gone for spring break, a villain infiltrates the school. Luckily a sleeper agent has been lying in wait. Hold on... it's Beth?!? Oh boy... (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Duty: When Duncan realises Chef is getting kids to tattle on him in return for chocolate milk, he sees an opportunity. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Ocean's Five: The Mermicornos plan a heist to recover an artefact. But without powers of her own, Kameko doubts her value to the team. (S1 Ep107)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Vision Pool: Eager to decode the message from the Whispering Willows, Sophia skips party planning to visit the Vision Pool, after promising Ava she wouldn't. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Palace Of The Powerless: Felicity and Miguel attend a costume party at The Palace of the Perfect, where they end up in a fight to take back some stolen powers. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: My Fair Yeti: Yana's invited to a fancy society event, but she's afraid she'll make a fool of herself. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Whack Mirror: Chef warns Beth and Cody that making goofy faces into a mirror will cause them to get stuck that way. It turns out he was right, just not in the way any of them ever imagined. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Broken Back Kotter: Izzy nominates Chef for the Daycare Professional of the Year award and will do whatever it takes to see him win. As it turns out, it takes a lot. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Weekend at Buddy's: After Cody's best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: MacArthur Park: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Epic Fail: Astra crafts a faulty talisman, putting Squishella and Gwen in a situation that's too close for comfort. (S1 Ep108)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Broken Gem: The Sapphires try everything to prevent Sophia and Ava from fighting, but they've got bigger problems: two dastardly henchmen are after the grimstone. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Boogie Man: While getting ready for a big dance competition, Felicity starts having nightmares about the Boogie Man. (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Souper Monster: In order to help Miguel win the 'Golden Ladle' prize in Mythlandia's annual cooking competition, Felicity buys him a bag of magic beans. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Opening Act: After failing to open a jar Chef believes he's entering his twilight years. This prompts Beth and the kids to dig up something from his youth to rejuvenate him. (S3 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Van Hogling: Chef and the kids take a field trip to Sugar's farm, but ignoring all of Sugar's strict and boring farm rules has dire consequences. (S3 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ticking Crime Bomb: Leshawna and Izzy trick Owen into thinking he's destined to be a criminal mastermind, but when he joins the scariest gang in town they have to mount a rescue attempt. (S3 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Knit Wit: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: knitting. But after using it to save his classmates, he proudly admits it. (S3 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Fuss on the Bus: Having never booked the field trip he promised the kids, Chef has to manufacture a full day of delays on the bus trip to avoid getting to Happy Sunshine Good Time Land. (S3 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Cone-versation: Noah is forced to wear a cone of shame and feels left out of everything. But when he learns of pirate treasure buried under the school, he becomes leader of the quest. (S3 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snow Country For Old Men: In an attempt to win the holidays, Chef brings snowmen to life. But when they turn out to be evil, Chef and the kids have to jingle some bells. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Opposites Attract: Dynamo visits the Power Players and swears he isn't a bad guy, he just needs their help to free himself from the clutches of Madcap! Will Axel give him a second chance? (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Sound of a Lemming: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Boaracle: The Boaracle, a boar who claims to predict the future, makes a series of predictions about Miguel that all come true. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Out Of The Box: When Felicity goes viral doing fun unboxing videos, a jealous Rudy slips Pandora's Box into her scratching post house. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Lego Friends: the Next Chapter
programme.desc: The Heart of Heartlake: The student council is accepting ideas for this year's big initiative! Aliya races to think of a proposal as Brad's bad idea grows in popularity. (S1 Ep7)

programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Caradog y ceiliog a Marged a'i chwningen. Today we meet Caradog the cockerel and Marged and her rabbit.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Fflwff yn ceisio bwyta popeth mae Brethyn yn casglu i'w cartref. Mae'n anodd pacio bag bwyd pan ma Fflwff ar hyd lle! Fluff tries to eat everything Tweedy finds to take back to the den.

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pam bod y tymhorau'n newid?' yw cwestiwn Nanw heddiw, ac mae gan Dad-cu ateb dwl a doniol. Grandpa spins a tale about 4 rhubarb-loving monsters and the girl who teaches them a lesson!

programme.title: New: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan mae hen elyn eu rhieni'n ymosod mae Jetboi a Jetferch yn cyfuno'u doniau i drechu'r dihiryn, neu dyna'r bwriad te be! When their parents' old enemy attacks, Jet-boy and Jet-girl unite.

programme.title: New: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Gellionnen sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Gellionnen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Harri a'r Octonots yn helpu hen ffrindiau, y Crancod Cnau Coco, i ddarganfod pwy sy'n dwyn eu cnau coco. Harri and the Octonauts help their old friends the Coconut Crabs.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ac anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn cawn ddysgu mwy am y Racwn a'r Gwyfyn. In this programme we meet the Racoon and the Moth.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw mae'r niwl yn gwneud i bopeth edrych yn llwyd. Sut all Pablo a'r criw ddod a lliw yn ol i'w byd? Today Pablo needs to colour some fog!

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Plwmp a Deryn eisiau chwarae ar y si-so. Ond, yn anffodus, nid yw'r si-so'n gweithio'n iawn. Plwmp and Deryn want to play on the see-saw, but unfortunately, it's not working properly!

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Gafael Afal: Wedi dechrau simsan, mae'r tm yn darganfod ffordd hawdd i gasglu afalau. Apple Grapple: After a shaky start, the team discover an easy way to pick apples.

programme.title: Kim a Ct a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Ct ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim & Ct as they search for the character Twrch in the forest.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Awn i'r Ariannin yn Ne America i ddysgu am fwyd fel asado ac ymweld 'r Wladfa ym Mhatagonia. Today we visit a South American country where there's a community of Welsh speakers - Argentina.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Help Llaw wedi trefnu helfa drysor! All Capten Twm arwain ei ffrindiau at y trysor? For today's adventure, Help Llaw has organised a pirate treasure hunt!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno gyda theulu sy'n cneifio ar eu fferm, Erin yn chwarae rygbi, a Meleri yn mynd am dro gyda Mai ym Mharc Cwm Darran. Today: sheep shearing and rugby.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Ar ddamwain, mae Jac Do'n torri fs Sali Mali wrth chwarae pl-droed yn y ty! Jac Do accidentally breaks Sali Mali's vase whilst playing football indoors!

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae anifeiliaid Ynys Lon wrth eu bodd pan mae Capten Twm yn galw. Mae'n dda am ddweud straeon - a fydd ganddo stori iddynt? The animals of Ynys Lon are delighted when Captain Twm calls by.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae yna aur ym Mhorth yr Haul! Ond pwy sydd wedi cipio'r trysor? When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Porth yr Aur, it's a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn mynnu gallu rhedeg system diogelwch newydd Mauss ar ben ei hun - ond mae problem! Toad installs a new Mauss security system - but it leaves him locked out of Toad Hall!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Meurig y gath a Jini a'u cheffylau. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Today we meet Meurig the cat and Jini and her horses.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Brethyn a Flwff yn ffeindio buwch goch gota yn yr ystafell crefft. Mae Brethyn yn gwneud gwely i'r anifail i gysgu ynddi. Tweedy and Fluff find a ladybird in the craft room.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch a'i ffrindiau? What's happening in the world of Twm Twrch and friends?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Seth yn gofyn 'Pam bod siocled mor flasus?' ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori ddwl a doniol am yr adeg pan roedd siocled yn blasu'n ofnadwy! Seth asks 'Why is chocolate so tasty?'.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan mae Lili Lafant a Cwstenin Cranc yn uno, mae Jet-fab am eu trechu. Dysga Jetboi mai gwendid nid mantais yw derbyn cymorth. Jet-boy learns that receiving help is indeed not a weakness.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Bedol sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Bedol join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Richard wedi dod a'r pobyddion i ardd Bodnant i osod y sialens felys nesa. From striking floral displays to beautiful desserts, the bakers learn about the power of presentation. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Mae'r actor Sion Alun Owen yn y stiwdio, a dysgwn fwy am dm rygbi cynghrair y 'Cardiff Demons'. Actor Sion Alun Owen is here, and we learn more about the 'Cardiff Demons' rugby league team.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: Nia Marshalsay-Thomas sy'n ymweld 'r cynhyrchwyr ceffylau, Ron a Debbie Thomas, yn eu canolfan geffylau ger Llanddarog. A visit to Ron and Debbie Thomas at their equestrian centre.

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Awn i un o syrcasau cyfoes mwyaf Ewrop gyda Trystan Chambers, a chawn gip ar waith yr argraffwr Elin Crowley. We're at the Celtic Deaf Festival and see glass-work at Swansea School of Art.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Ysbyty: Plant Ni
programme.desc: Am y tro cyntaf, cawn gipolwg tu l i'r llenni ar un o Wardiau Plant prysuraf Gogledd Cymru, yn Ysbyty Glan Clwyd. A behind the scenes look at the busy Children's Ward at Ysbyty Glan Clwyd.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Sali Mali'n cynllunio i fynd i wersylla ar ei phen ei hun ond yn colli peth o'i hoffer. All ei ffrindiau ei hachub? Sali Mali plans a solo camping trip but loses some of her equipment!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn gofyn 'Be ddigwyddodd i'r deinosoriaid?' ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori ddwl am gm guddio arbennig ddigwyddodd rhwng holl ddeinosoriaid y byd a holl lygod y byd! Today: dinosaurs!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth mae Twrchyn am ei wneud gyda tri dymuniad gan Doremi y Dewin? Twrchyn finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni'n meddwl bo planhigion yn ddiflas, ond mae'n newid ei feddwl diolch i bersawr Lili Lafant a bwystfil o blanhigyn! Joni thinks plants are boring - but he soon changes his mind!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Cwm sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Cwm join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: SeliGo
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Seligo heddiw? What's happening in the Seligo world today?

programme.title: Ar Goll yn Oz
programme.desc: Mae Fitz y Dewin Drwg yn herwgipio Toto, sy'n gorfodi Dorothy i gyd weithio gydag Asiant Walfur. Fitz the Crooked Magician steals Toto, forcing Dorothy to team up with Agent Pugmill.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cymeriadau dwl y tro hyn? Mae rhywun yn cael ei bigo! What's happening in the crazy characters' world today? Someone's been bitten!

programme.title: Gwrach y Rhibyn
programme.desc: Cyfres antur eithafol lle' mae timau yn trio cyrraedd lloches ddiogel cyn i'r haul fachlud, a dianc rhag Gwrach y Rhibyn. Survival adventure series; the aim is to find shelter before sunset!

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Cyfle i grwydro Pen Llyn yng nghwmni Harri Parri wrth iddo deithio drwy fro ei febyd. Author and minister Harri Parri introduces viewers to the Llyn Peninsula as he explores the area.

programme.title: Adre: Lowri Evans
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd Nia yn ymweld chartref y gantores Lowri Evans. This week, Nia visits the home of singer Lowri Evans.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Noson Lawen
programme.desc: Dilwyn Morgan sy'n cyflwyno artistiaid talentog o Lyn ac Eifionydd. Gyda Twm Morys a Gwyneth Glyn, Dylan Morris, Caryl Burke a mwy. Dilwyn Morgan introduces artists from Llyn & Eifionydd.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: BWMP
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod pen-blwydd Eleanor, a daw Lewis o hyd i syrpris annisgwyl yn y bin. Eleanor's birthday arrives, and Lewis finds an unexpected surprise.

programme.title: New: BWMP
programme.desc: Mae cylchgrawn Amdani yn dathlu tair blynedd, ond mae'r dathliadau'n troi'n chwerw. Amdani is celebrating 3 years, but the celebrations suddenly turn sour.

programme.title: Guinness World Records Cymru 2025
programme.desc: Ymdrechion i dorri recordiau Guinness World Records Cymru 2025: menywod cryf yn tynnu Injan, blodau diri, raff trapeze, a mwy! We follow attempts to break Guinness World Records Cymru 2025.

programme.title: New: Mini Hana Medi
programme.desc: I ddathlu ei phen-blwydd yn 30, mae Hana Medi eisiau her o rasio mini a dilyn yn l-traed ei rhieni, ond mae problem! To celebrate her 30th birthday, Hana Medi wants a mini racing challenge!

programme.title: New: Mini Hana Medi
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae Hana'n dysgu 'sandblastio' a weldo, ond dyw pethau ddim yn mynd cystal 'r disgwyl! This time, Hana learns to sandblast and weld, but things don't go as well as expected!

programme.title: Pobol y Penwythnos
programme.desc: Ann, Ted a Dewi sy'n rhannu profiadau eu penwythnos perffaith - dyma dri sy'n byw am ddihangfa'r Sul. A day in the life of fitness instructor Ann, cameraman Ted and security guard Dewi.

programme.desc: Mae Storm Dewi wedi cyrraedd y dyffryn, ac mae Cadi'n cael galwad yn dweud fod coeden wedi cwympo. Storm Dewi has arrived, and Cadi gets a call saying that a tree has fallen on the tracks!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Cai'n penderfynu chwarae cuddio. Ond mae Cai a Bochau'n methu dod o hyd i Anni, ydy hi'n creu annibendod yn rhywle? Anni and Cai decide to play hide and seek, but there's chaos!

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Rocco a Malcolm Allen o'r Warws Werdd wedi gofyn i Harri ddod draw i beintio wal. Rocco and Malcolm Allen from Warws Werdd have asked Harri to come over and paint a wall.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Dywed Sali Mali wrth ei ffrindiau am beidio ag ofni'r wenynen sy'n suo o'u cwmpas, ond mae Jaci Soch yn ei gwylltio a chaiff ei golio ar ei ben-l! This time, the friends encounter a bee!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn gwybod pam fod y cwt newydd yn yr archfrarchnad yn ei wneud mor anghyfforddus. Pablo doesn't understand why the new hut in the supermarket makes him so uncomfortable.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad gwlad sy'n llawn coedwigoedd glaw trofannol a mynyddoedd hudol: Periw. Peru: We learn about the history of the Incas, about 'Machu Picchu' & an animal called a Vicuna.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Moc Samson yn galw i chwarae gemau fideo, ond mae'n rhaid i'r Jetlu fynd i'r afael Peredur Plagus. Moc calls over to play video games with Joni but the Jetlu have to deal with Peredur.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Pontybrenin sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Pontybrenin join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn stiwdio Stwnsh Sadwrn gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the Stwnsh Sadwrn studio for more fun.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae aelodau ac arweinwyr Cr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen Caernarfon am ddiolch i'w harweinydd am sefydlu'r cr. This time: a floral thanks to the founder of Cr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Tasg heddiw? Ffeindio gwisg addas ar gyfer parti plu, a'r ir sydd angen sylw yw Gemma - athrawes nofio o Gaerffili, sy'n fam i Ella, un oed. Today, we need an outfit for a special hen! [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sy'n 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru. Y brifddinas, Caerdydd, sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. Join Geraint Hardy as he discovers what Cardiff has to offer this time. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Amser i ddathlu a dysgu sgiliau choux, gan gynnwys sut i greu patisserie eiconig: y Paris Brest! In their latest kitchen test, the bakers get a handle on choux pastry and also celebrate! [SL]

programme.title: Sgorio: Y Drenewydd v Aberystwyth
programme.desc: Gm fyw o'r Cymru Premier JD rhwng Aberystwyth a'r Drenewydd. C/G 12.45. Live football match from the JD Cymru Premier between Aberystwyth Town and Newtown. K/O 12.45.

programme.title: Gwladfa: Gwilym Bowen Rhys
programme.desc: Y tro ma, mae Gwilym yn croesi'r paith ac yn cyrraedd y gymuned Gymraeg yng Nghwm Hyfryd. This time, Gwilym's journey takes him across the plain and to the Welsh community of 'Cwm Hyfryd'. [SL]

programme.title: Llond Bol o Sbaen: Chris yn Mallorca
programme.desc: Mae antur fwyd Sbaenaidd Chris yn parhau ym Mallorca gyda chwmni'r Chef seren Michelin, Tomos Parry, a'r actor Elen Rhys. Chris' Spanish food adventure continues on the island of Mallorca. [SL]

programme.title: Cymru Wyllt Gudd
programme.desc: Am y tro cyntaf, mae technoleg camera arloesol yn dadorchuddio dirgelion byd natur Cymru dan y lloer. Nature series: swimming hedgehogs, fishing bats, super moons & more. [SL]

programme.title: Rygbi Ewrop: Gweilch v Lyon
programme.desc: Gweilch v Lyon yn Rownd 8-Olaf Cwpan Her Ewrop yn fyw o Stadiwm Swansea.com. Ospreys v Lyon in the Quarter-final of the European Challenge Cup live from the Swansea.com Stadium. K/O 17.30.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Heddiw fydd Elliw, Rhys, Dilys a Leo yn mynd a'r criw am dro i Gapel, o gwmpas Penarlag, i Rymni, ac o Aberogwr i Ddwn-rhefn. We explore Capel, Hawarden, Rhymney, & Ogmore to Southerndown.

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr: Aled Jones
programme.desc: Cyfle i berson lwcus i berfformio gyda'i harwr. Yr arwr dan sylw y tro hwn yw'r tenor byd-enwog o Fn, Aled Jones. The hero this time is the world famous tenor from Anglesey, Aled Jones.

programme.title: Curadur
programme.desc: Tyrchu drwy archif Recordiau Sain yng nghwmni'r cynhyrchydd a DJ hip-hop, Don Leisure. We meet the legendary characters behind the songs DJ Don Leisure sampled on his record, 'Tyrchu Sain'.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, awn ar daith i Gretna Green yn yr Alban lle ma pobl wedi bod yn dianc iddo i briodi ers 1754. We road trip to Gretna Green to help Daniel and Sara from Dyffryn Nantlle get wed.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Mae llawer o brysurdeb ond sut mae'r tyrchwr enwocaf un - y wahadden - yn setlo? The burrows are crowded and the mammals are busy. But how is the mole settling down?

programme.title: Murder East, Murder West
programme.desc: 1990. Thriller. Directed by Peter Smith. Stars Jeroen Krabb, Suzanna Hamilton & Joanna Pearce. A crook finds his past catching up with him in the shape of the ex-girlfriend he thought was dead.

programme.title: The Cat Burglar
programme.desc: 1961. Crime Drama. Directed by William Whitney. Stars Jack Hogan, June Kenney & John Baer. A burglar becomes a valuable target after stealing a briefcase that contains a secret formula. [S]

programme.title: Fighting Man of the Plains
programme.desc: 1949. Western. Stars Randolph Scott, Bill Williams & Victor Jory. Jim Dancer, one of Quantrill's Raiders, stages attacks on Kansas on behalf of the fallen Confederacy. [S]

programme.title: Zane Grey: Thread of Respect
programme.desc: 1959. Western. Directed by John English. Stars Danny Thomas, Nick Adams & James Coburn. An immigrant and his son are met with hostility when they open a tailor shop in a new town.

programme.title: Web of Evidence
programme.desc: 1959. Thriller. Director: Jack Cardiff. Stars Van Johnson, Vera Miles, Bernard Lee & Jean Kent. A WW2 evacuee returns years later to England and finds his father in prison and framed for murder. [S]

programme.title: Meet Mr Callaghan
programme.desc: 1954. Crime drama directed by Charles Saunders. Private detective Slim Callaghan (Derrick De Marney) is hired to find out why a rich uncle changed his will. [S]

programme.title: Three Steps to the Gallows
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Director John Gilling. American cargo ship Officer Stevens (Scott Brady), finds out that his brother is the frame-up victim of a smuggling gang and is due to be executed for murder. [S]

programme.title: The Mysterious Mr Nicholson
programme.desc: 1947. Crime drama. Directed by Oswald Mitchell and starring Anthony Hulme, Lesley Osmond and Frank Hawkins. A solicitors' clerk is sent to deliver a will and finds the recipient murdered. [S]

programme.title: River Patrol
programme.desc: 1948. Crime Drama. Director: Ben R. Hart. Stars John Blythe, Wally Patch & Stan Paskin. Two police officers go undercover as husband and wife to expose a smuggling ring operating along the Thames. [S]

programme.title: The Ship That Died of Shame
programme.desc: (AKA PT Raiders) 1955. Thriller. Director Basil Dearden. Stars Richard Attenborough, George Baker and Bill Owen. A trio of ex-servicemen begin smuggling black market items into post-war Britain. [S]

programme.title: White Corridors
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Directed by Pat Jackson. Stars Googie Withers, James Donald & Petula Clark. An insightful story about the day to day activities within Yeoman's Hospital during the early 1950s. [S]

programme.title: The Writing on the Wall
programme.desc: Mike Read embarks on an intriguing journey exploring the Blue Plaques across Britain, bringing to life the numerous people who have contributed something unique to the making of our country. [S]

programme.title: The Brave Don't Cry
programme.desc: 1952. Drama. Directed by Philip Leacock. Starring John Gregson, Meg Buchanan & John Rae. Based on a true story. In a small Scots mining-town, a mine cave-in seals the entire crew. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Dowsing/Near Death Experience. 1995. Michael Aspel introduces extraordinary stories including a man whose predictions started to come true and a woman who was brought back from the brink of death. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for an evening of investigations and a bit of horror. The first offering of the evening is the 70s series Doomwatch and the captivating episode By the Pricking of My Thumbs. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: By the Pricking of My Thumbs. 1971. Stars John Nolan, Jean Trend, Sally Thomsett & Colin Jeavons. A schoolboy is expelled because of his genes. Can people be labelled for life by science? [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Next up, we remain in the 70s with a spine tingling feature! Caroline Munro introduces the 1978 sci-fi horror The Alpha Incident, about a deadly alien organism that threatens to end humanity. [S]

programme.title: The Alpha Incident
programme.desc: 1978. Sci-fi. Directed by Bill Rebane. Stars Ralph Meeker, Stafford Morgan & John F. Goff. An alien organism with the potential to destroy all life on Earth is accidently released in a small town. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro leaves the doors open for a little bit longer to give a peek at next week's unforgettable features. [S]

programme.title: Hot Money
programme.desc: 2001. Crime Drama. Directed by Terry Winsor. Stars Caroline Quentin, Melanie Hill & Georgia Mackenzie. Three women plot to steal thousands of pounds from the Bank of England's incinerators. [S]

programme.title: Hot Money
programme.desc: 2001. Crime Drama. Directed by Terry Winsor. Stars Caroline Quentin, Melanie Hill & Georgia Mackenzie. Three women plot to steal thousands of pounds from the Bank of England's incinerators. [S]

programme.title: The Caller
programme.desc: 1987. Mystery. Directed by Arthur Allan Seidelman. Stars Malcolm McDowell & Madolyn Smith. One night, a strange visitor finds his way into the home of a lone woman and an odd mind game begins. [S]

programme.title: Her First Affair
programme.desc: 1932. Drama. Director: Allan Dwan. Stars Ida Lupino in her debut, George Curzon & Diana Napier. A story of a young girl who falls in love with a novelist & is cured by his wife falling for her fianc

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Some People of the Thirties. 1964. Narrated by Anthony Quayle. A presentation of the famous personalities of the 30s, including Charlie Chaplin, George Bernard Shaw and H.G. Wells. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy (1945)
programme.desc: 1945. Action. Director: William Berke. Stars Morgan Conway, Anne Jeffreys, Mike Mazurki. Police detective Dick Tracy must identify and apprehend a serial killer known as 'Splitface'.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Violent Suitor. 1955. Stars Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Advice columnist 'Aunt Lottie' is at risk after advising a woman to break up with her fiancee. [S]

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. A Case of the Slow. Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Shrinking Spaceman. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Ronnie Stevens & Dick Vosburgh. When the Galasphere crew is sent to repair a transmitter on Pallas, Husky succumbs to a strange shrinking disease. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King Gets Crowned. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King invades Wayne Manor to steal back a mistakenly rigged clock and attempts to rob Bruce's pocket watch collection. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: School for a King. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Peter Illing, David Davies. Determined to learn more about his realms and the plight of his subjects, Richard sets out for the countryside in disguise. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Creeps
programme.desc: The Iron Monster. 1939. Stars Bela Lugosi, Dorothy Arnold & Robert Kent. Spies capture and question reporter Jean. [S]

programme.title: Operation Third Form
programme.desc: 1966. Adventure. Directed by David Eady. Stars John Moulder-Brown & Derren Nesbitt. Children save a junk collector from being accused of theft and prevent someone from stealing a painting. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Charm Pedlar. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Victor Maddern, John Arnatt. Robin goes undercover as a conman in an attempt to expose a crooked charm pedlar but ends up in trouble with the Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: Battle Beyond The Sun
programme.desc: 1962. Sci-fi. Directed by Mikhail Karyukov, Aleksandr Kozyr & Francis Ford Coppola. Stars Edd Perry & Arla Powell. In the distant future, two rival nations race to be the first to land on Mars. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life How do you Swing?
programme.desc: 1964. An eye opening look into how research into the golfer's swing is progressing, with a look at what is involved in the swing of the golf club from a physiological and physical viewpoint.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Dream.1959. Starring Reginald Owen, Richard Lupino and Mollie Roden. Separated by WW2, a husband and wife both dream that their partner is in danger, but is it just a dream? [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Robert to the Rescue. 1963. Stars David Graham, Sylvia Anderson & John Bluthal. Steve and Venus take Professor Matic to a new planet the professor spotted with his new telescope.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Model Spy. 1967. Stars Sylvia Anderson, David Healy & Gary Files. The Mysterons target a French fashion designer, who is secretly the Controller of the European Area Intelligence Service in Paris.

programme.title: Three Crooked Men
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Director: Ernest Morris. Stars Gordon Jackson, Sarah Lawson, Warren Mitchell. A shopkeeper is taken hostage when 3 crooks break into his shop to drill through to the bank next door. [S]

programme.title: The Four Feathers (1978)
programme.desc: 1978. Drama. Directed by Don Sharp. Stars Beau Bridges, Robert Powell & Jane Seymour. Lieutenant Faversham dishonours his regiment and loses his fiance, but can he regain his honour and his love? [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars

programme.desc: Be in the Pink!: Oh no! The baby is sick! Rosie the Pig has developed an incomprehensible rash after falling into a nettle bush. (S6 Ep18)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: A Pineapple of Discord: The Wolves find someone's pineapple in the forest. The temptation to eat it is stronger than the desire to find the real owner, until Masha appears at their table. (S6 Ep19)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Where Did it Goat?: The Bear and the other forest inhabitants are puzzled: huge circles have appeared in the field near the forest. Moreover, Masha's Goat has disappeared! (S6 Ep20)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Party Popper: When Bubble keeps trying to make her guest's party better and better, she ends up ignoring what he really wants. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Chain Reaction: When Bubble tries to help her guest, Marie, with her science experiments, they start to merge and run rampant in the hotel. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Battle of the Bands: Kitty, Frido, Zonty, Pinky, and Rio form a band, but their bickering causes them to split. Pop Star Kitty must reunite them in time for their first concert. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd: Zing and Kitty team up with Rio in a competition, but Zing is afraid he'll make them lose. Athlete Kitty helps Zing understand Rio has his own skills to bring to the team. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: The Case of the Mysterious Mystery: DB accidentally eats all the sparkleberries Nori was planning to use in his next dessert. He tries covering it up while Detective Kitty investigates. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Frido Unleashed: After the Beavers get Construction Kitty to do their to-do list of repairs for them so they can go to the beach, Frido steps up and helps Kitty learn how to say "no". (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Winner Bakes All: Construction Kitty builds Nori a robotic helper to concoct the perfect smoothie. When the electronic chef rebels, Nori and Kitty must defeat it in a Smoothie Showdown. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Mayhem at the Museum: Explorer Kitty covers for PI at the museum to allow him to enjoy his new hobby: weightlifting. But she unintentionally awakens an ancient Penguinese statue! (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unbearable Beach: On a nice summer's day Bear, as usual, goes fishing. But the fishing trip didn't quite work out: the forest dwellers made a "beach" at Bear's favourite spot. (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: When a Pig Flies: Rosie has lost her peace because of the ripe, appetising acorns growing right above her little snout. (S6 Ep1)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: All You Need is a Goal: The ball is on the field, the players are in the field, the Bear in the chair is rooting for his favourite team. But Masha got bored in anticipation of a goal. (S6 Ep2)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Soup Pursuit: The wolves are going to cook borscht under Masha's guidance. They have a cookbook, a big pot and a ravenous appetite. But they still gotta get the ingredients! (S6 Ep3)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Tricky Tricks: Bear's old circus friend Tiger comes to visit. What could be more wonderful than to passionately play chess with your best friend? But Masha has her own idea of miracles. (S6 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Think Outside the Box: Masha and Penguin go to Mars and from there they go straight to the open sea to the Frog Princess, and new adventures are already waiting for friends overboard. (S6 Ep5)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Birthday Surprise: Cory plans a surprise birthday for Mama aboard her friend, Sandy Anchors, that goes a little off course. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bumper Bowling: On a family night out at the Bumperton Hills Bowling alley, Cory decides he's too old to still use bumpers. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Changing Lanes: Cory and Chrissy swap roles with Mama and Papa to be parents for a day. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: The Library: Cory gets his very own library card, but can he keep it after he misplaces a library book? (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Junior Build: Ms. Motors and the class go on an exciting field trip to a local construction site where they get to meet the whole construction crew. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Harry Hoodini: When local magician Harry Hoodini visits the Motorsorri to put on a show, Frannie takes it upon herself to prove to the class that magic isn't real. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Crash Track Trick: Catboy wants to try out his Wildstripes' incredible speed. (S5 Ep33)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Gekko's Speedy Lizard: Gekko wants to stop a speedy Night Ninja - but his lumbering lizard's just too slow... (S5 Ep34)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Night Ninja's School of Naughtiness: Night Ninja sets up a school for villains. (S5 Ep35)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Jolly Ninjalino: Pirate Robot seeks help when Night Ninja steals his hat. When Pirate Robot is left out of the PJs plans, he tries to help anyway. (S5 Ep36)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: No Birthday without Hazelnuts: Today is Jean-Claude's birthday! To celebrate, Billy and Suzie have decided to make a fantastic hazelnut birthday cake with him. JC is thrilled!(S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Rodeo Stars: Discovering that Jessy Dog takes part in rodeos, Billy decides he wants to do the same. But how will he manage without a horse? Scott's rocking chair will do just fine! (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Cactus Herbal Tea: Jean-Claude has caught a cold. Billy thinks he should protect his throat with a neckerchief, so he takes JC to see Dede Rabbit to ask if he can borrow his scarf. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The New Sheriff: Billy finds a gift in the latest issue of The Adventures of Jessy Dog - a sheriff's badge! He fastens it to his chest and sets off in search of some bad guys to arrest. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tickle Trouble: When Clover brings tickly Tickle Bugs onto Dino Ranch, he tries to solve the problem himself and makes the problem even worse. (S2 Ep36)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: A Pond Farewell: When Flopper the Plesiosaur grows too big for her pond, the Dino Ranchers need to find her a new home, but Jon is having a hard time with his friend moving away. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tyrannosaurus Wrecks: The Jr Ranchers face a challenge when trying to get a feisty pair of baby T-Rex's to listen and learn how to be Dino Ranch dinos. (S2 Ep38)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Dilo Difference: Jon wants to help a Dilophosaurus fit in on the Ranch, but he runs into problems when the other dinosaurs are startled by the excitable little dino's appearance. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Odd Partners: When headstrong Blitz and stubborn Clara Tinhorn get lost in the Hidden Forest, the two must work together to escape while avoiding an angry T-Rex looking for her baby. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Blitz Be Gone: After avoiding his Dino Dental check-up then finally going, Blitz learns that he had nothing to worry about, and he's glad that he tried something new. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Pequeo Big Shot: Miguel invents a mechanical lasso, but when it continually malfunctions and is needed to save the day, Miguel learns to keep trying and never give up. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Thunderin' Thundertot: When Thundertot crashes Clover and Min's sleepover in the Hatchery, Clover's plans for the night are interrupted by the rambunctious baby spinosaur. (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Clara's Shortcut Rut: When Clara Tinhorn takes shortcuts on a Dino Ranch practice course, she lands her brothers in trouble and needs to put those skills to use. (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fast And Furrryous: Bear has made a new purchase: he's bought a motorcycle! Now as a cool biker, he plans on impressing She-Bear, but she doesn't seem to like it very much. (S5 Ep25)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Hero: When facing a scary dragon, the legendary hero runs away. Molang and Piu Piu catch up to him and help him regain his self-confidence. (S5 Ep23)
